chapters.title: Chapter 38: News in Tel'aran'rhiod
chapters.info: Raen, p. 590—Leader of the group of Tinkers who visited the Two Rivers, the same group that Perrin and Egwene encountered on their way out of Emond's Field. He is Aram's father, and Ila's husband. Perrin remembers with remorse the look on Raen's face when Aram left him to take up the sword with Perrin and his followers. See also Aram; Ila.
